about us

WHAT IS A GROWTH POINT?

This is a platform for self-development, which operates by subscription.

This month you get a new class schedule with video tutorials, practical tasks, podka.Tami, articles and techniques from a psychologist, as well as communicate chat and roll

THE PROJECT WORKS IN THREE DIRECTIONS

community

01

Community pushes boundaries consciousness

We will be a lot of cancer format enata on webinars mardonik

condition

02

Head, free from country and thoughts, bring ideas many times faster

Let's work with a psychologist hinders movement

PRACTICE

03

Imagination helps to find non-standard solutions

Let's get rid of it with practical washing zamaaniy

These three components and there is your Growth Point.

BECAUSE THE POINT OF GROWTH - IS

1/3

Community

A lover of mine asks an expert, a photographer - to a blogger, and a visualizer - an assistant content marketer, and find the answer

Because only in this way will you get out of the frame and form your arna and work and content

2/3

Practice

Moor will be nice to boil, because we let's get creative!

Marathon tasks will make you look at familiar things from a different angle, turn on your ingenuity and start imagination.

3/3

Change of mind

This is the main purpose of the Point of Growth, because your thoughts are writing for development. Therefore, from us there will be fair portions of finishing

And from a psychologist, answers to questions and Useful articles so that you work through the fears

HOW THE IDEA ARISED PROJECT?

This year we launched the courses "Let's shoot a story" and "Dowa shoot a video:

YOU KNOW WHAT WE
IMPRESSED?

The community that has emerged from the courses is a bit of a systemic impulsive but vibrant community. The players energetically shared the results, received a well-served portion of "woo" and found a lot of homogeneity and teamwork

And then about the looli time - it’s not enough for the course to contain all the knowledge and transfer it to you. Intensive training is based on

So we came up with the idea of polysto, where you can adjust learning to your rhythm of life, so as not to go through the process and constantly learn onomphon volume.
